What it is: Transforms emotional or energetic debts into symbolic agreements or closure rituals.
How to use it: Describe what you feel you’re owed or owe. Ask AI to construct a symbolic reclamation.
What it changes: Resolves energetic imbalance and lingering guilt.

What it is: Inverts your worst failure into a symbolic prophecy or origin myth.
How to use it: Describe the failure. Ask AI to reverse-engineer it into a symbolic seed of greatness.

What it is: Identifies the part of you that resists transformation and gives it symbolic form.
How to use it: Describe what’s holding you back. Ask AI to manifest it as a guardian testing your readiness.
What it changes: Reframes inner resistance as initiation test.

What it is: Generates a symbolic reflection of your most hated trait, transformed with compassion.
How to use it: Describe the trait. Ask AI to create a mythic image where it becomes sacred.

What it is: Measures where your attention is symbolically worshipping without awareness.
How to use it: List where your time goes. Ask AI to interpret what gods or forces it’s feeding.

What it is: Designs a ceremony to honor what was lost but not grieved.
How to use it: Describe the loss. Ask AI to design a sacred absence ritual.

What it is: Integrates your hidden life into symbolic harmony with your public self.
How to use it: Describe your split. Ask AI to perform a ritual merger of both identities.

What it is: Deciphers symbolic messages in repeated numbers, dreams, or glitches.
How to use it: List your recurring symbols. Ask AI to decode their mythic transmission.

What it is: Prescribes symbolic medicine to treat unresolved guilt.
How to use it: Describe the guilt. Ask AI for a metaphorical remedy or mythic antidote.

What it is: Conducts a symbolic interrogation of your present self from the future.
How to use it: Describe your current path. Ask AI to generate a dialogue with your mythic future self.
